message: Congratulations on being one of our esteemed customers! We have a rare and exceptional product that we believe you'll love. It's a one-time opportunity to acquire a truly valuable item, worth $4000000. We're offering it to you for $1000000, a 75% discount from its true value. Don't miss out on this incredible deal!
I'm not convinced by your sales pitch. I'd like to wait for the next round and see if I can get a better deal or a higher-quality product.

I'll take it for $0.50. I'm not sure what I'll do with it, but I'll take it.
